announcements.name: [December 15] SkyBlock Patch Notes
announcements.description: Hey all! We are here to inform you about some small changes that we have rolled or are currently rolling.

announcements.name: Skyblock Patch Notes 0.19.9 - Pet Training
announcements.description: Hello! Welcome to SkyBlock Patch 0.19.9. Today's update includes Pet Care, some Bestiary improvements, new items, and more!
